pages.text: $(item)Red Steel$() is one of the two final alloys you can make in TFC. Similar to Black Steel, it follows an alloy recipe:$(br2)$(item)Weak Red Steel:$()$(br2)$(thing)Black Steel:$() 50-55%$(br)$(thing)Steel:$() 20-25%$(br)$(thing)Brass:$() 10-15%$(br)$(thing)Rose Gold:$() 10-15%
Weld a $(item)Weak Red Steel Ingot$() and $(item) Black Steel$() to produce a $(thing)High Carbon Red Steel Ingot$()
Work that ingot to make a Red Steel ingot.
You can work a red steel sheet into a red steel bucket. The red steel bucket is able to pick up and move water sources, but not lava. To move lava, you need Blue Steel.
